title: Windows Update
body: I was forced to update Windows mid game and now I'm afraid of leaver buster (still updating). I had no choice in stopping the update either I'm just wondering if I can get out of leaverbuster because this isn't my fault

replies.body: I wouldn't worry if it's just one leave.  An account may only receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) lower priority queue after multiple leaves, and not just one.  Make sure to have your windows updated and are clear of any issues so the game isn't left hanging.  No worries!
